entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 13.
entry.summary: Showers ending this afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 early this afternoon. High 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:10 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 9:10 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
